alert.note: Alert for Castro; Parmer (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 10 at 5:27PM CDT until May 10 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lubbock Texas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Parmer County in the Panhandle of Texas... Western Castro County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 526 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lazbuddie, or 14 miles northeast of Muleshoe, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Summerfield, Easter, Lazbuddie, and Black. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
